website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch twin bed frame that is simple, elegant, and durable.
pros: 100% stainless steel craftsmanship to last a long time
Includes tools, instructions, and video for assembly
Elevated frame for storage space underneath
cons: Legs and slats tend to break easily

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and was easy to put together.. I’m still waiting on my new mattress but I have the frame together. There are bars that rub against each other in the middle of the badframe that could potentially be a noise maker so I put some cardboard between the metal to prevent that. The pictures included show what I mean. I will update after some use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pretty too
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 twins for a vacation rental property, and I love them. Easy to assemble and metal mattress support bars. Sturdy enough that I could stand on the bed to put in light bulbs. I bought these after seeing another review of adults standing on the beds, and I have no regrets. Great price for a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good height, but mattress slides.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son's first twin size bed, and it works well. My one problem with this bed is that the supporting rails under the mattress are smooth and raised. The mattress slides around a lot even with just a 40lb kid getting in and out. We sort of solved this with a mattress anti-slide mat, but I really wish there was either a recessed portion for the mattress, bars the length of the bed, or corner to prevent mattress slide, or something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 9 year old! Easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica barber

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We got this for our son's room and it took probably close to 2 hours to put together. But it looks great and both our son and dog are happy with it! Put together in the room you want it cause my hus band put together in a different room and had to remove the headboard when he realized it wouldn't fit through the door lol
customer_reviews.author: Amberly Berdine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The instructions weren’t complicated at all! My father and i built it in about an hour. Maybe a little more. I’m enjoying it a lot! I had a very huge, bulky frame before, and i love the simplicity of this one:) It also isn’t super tall like the old one, which I needed because my therapy dog has injured hips and it hurts her to jump down from most frames. And a bonus, it came FIVE DAYS before it was scheduled to! Which I was happy about since my boyfriend was staying over that night. We didn’t have to sleep on the floor haha
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: ***UPDATE*** changed my rating because the customer service for this item was very helpful! They replied immediately and offered to replace the item. Also gave instructions on setting up the bed. Wonderful company. I bought two of these beds, one was very easy to assemble. No trouble with it at all. The second however came missing a screw that connectsthe slats to the headboard. I cant use he bed without those two pieces.. so kind of a wast of money unless they send a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Rynisha jones

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: I think this bed frame is cool for the price! It fit perfect in my kids room. It makes the room look nice
customer_reviews.author: Pinkie Dabney

customer_reviews.title: ***** JUNK*****
customer_reviews.text: *****DO NOT BUY**** I purchased this frame in April. In just it completely fell apart in the middle of the night while my daughter was sleeping. She was hurt from the fall and the frame hitting her. I will never buy this brand again! I have purchased a couple different bed frames from Amazon and both times they have ended up being junk. We even had it professionally put together to be safe that it wouldn't break. Still, they fell completely apart. I order all the time from Amazon ,but I know I will not purchase bedding items from them again. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: this is not ok

customer_reviews.title: Good bed for kids
customer_reviews.text: Some of the holes were misaligned but easily fixed it with a screw driver and can't beat the price. The kids love it and I'm 126lbs layed on it to try it out without with any issues. And there's space under the bed for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for our sons after theirs were damaged in a move. They were so easy to put together. They have withstood bed jumping and boy roughhousing. Really great deal!
customer_reviews.author: KadeeBue

customer_reviews.title: Green Forest bed frames
customer_reviews.text: I needed some inexpensive bed frames for my daughter and here family when they moved back home. The frames were fairly easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Manwarren

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my granddaughter originally who stayed with us for a while before joining the Navy as an aircraft technician and she, who can be quite fussy about creature comforts, never complained. After she left I moved the bed to a cabin I have in the mountains and used it for my personal bed. Too my joyful surprise I found it to be solid, and quite comfortable under my 240 pounds of brawn. There was none of the frame shifting that I've come to expect of other beds and I slept solidly through the night. Yes, I'm buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Juney4

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy and what you paid for!
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to put together by myself which I have long acrylic nails so that’s saying something, took a little longer because I did it myself but still got the job done. Just recommend two people if you want it done faster. But it’s quite sturdy and I like the look of it! I’m ordering a full size one soon too!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: No instructions, but not too hard a puzzle.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdiness and esthetic as well as the high ground clearance that favors ease of rising for someone like me with chronic back issues. The 14in. height also lets me slide large storage bins underneath. The only drawback was that it came without instructions, just a picture to guess by. Unexpectedly, I was later e-mailed a video link to help with this, but I'd put the bed together by then.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great for spare room!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and has rubber feet to protect wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy
customer_reviews.text: My 15 yr old daughter put this together by herself. I bought it for her and it came when I wasn't home. It took her a couple of hours, but she had it together and was using it the same day! It feels sturdy and seems like it's well made, so far so good! I want to add that the foot board and head board are NOT as high as pictured. I realize the picture from company is deceiving. It is a good bed, but the picture should be replaced by a true picture of bed. So, I don't give it 5 stars after all.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M. Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: The video was a very good idea to add for those not used to tools ...
customer_reviews.text: This bed arrived in one box that was not damaged. The diagrams helped with the number and type of parts and close up of joining the parts. All screws where in a box. The large pieces had labels (like 7b) that matched the diagram.The video was a very good idea to add for those not used to tools and putting something together. It only took a several unhurried hours to put this bed together. I have 2 small 1ft square wooden rollers that I could easy move this bed by myself to the spare bedroom. I am waiting for the mattress to be delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DONT LOOK ANYMORE! THIS IS THE ONE FOR YOU!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the BEST DECISIONS I’ve ever made on AMAZON! I wanted a relatively inexpensive bed becuz I’m at my mothers place and plan on moving within the next few months. When I got this frame, my Dad put it together in about 2 hrs (he took his time so he wouldn’t scratch the frame since it is “cheap”) I put it up on bed risers that I purchased from Walmart and honeyyyyyyy I’m in heaven! This frame is coming with me to my new place for the guest bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Latarsha Debnam

customer_reviews.title: Worth spending the money on..
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for both my children and it’s easy to put together and it looks very nice. Definitely worth the money in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Berkey

customer_reviews.title: Best bed frame with a great low price.
customer_reviews.text: This was the best bed frame for under $100. It took 2 people you put together in about 1 hour. Very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tomarcia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Happy sleeper!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bed for a guest room. Looks good. Comfy to sleep on. The instructions for assembly were pretty clear, I just had to figure a few things out. I found a video on YouTube that was very helpful in addition to the enclosed instructions. Requires a bit of strength considering the amount of wrenching. But it was fun to see it come together. Took me about 3 hours. I wasn't in a hurry :) I kept the tools just in case something needs to be tightened.
customer_reviews.author: KikiF

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: works perfect for my mom in her assisted living apartment, she has had her and a grandkids sleeping on it at times with her.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Don't mess up putting this together.
customer_reviews.text: So long story short, my husband isn't the most handy guy. Typically it takes him some time to get stuff put together, but eventually he gets it. This however didn't go well. He put the bars upside down. He figured out his error, but once you have them locked in, they will NOT come undone again. We had to drill our own new holes and rig it up so it would work. Other than that, we like the frame. Doesn't squeak and despite it not being together exactly right it is good and sturdy. I wouldn't purchase this again to save the headache, but im not unhappy with the finished product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: THE MOST DIFFICULT BED FRAME I’VE EVER ENCOUNTER!
customer_reviews.text: I am about to move to a new apartment and that’s the reason why I am looking into a twin bed frame. The process of putting the bed together was okay at first..BUT WHEN I GET TO THE LAST STEP which is putting part #4 into the slots. OH MY GOD it is JUST NOT POSSIBLE. I have to use a hammer to get them in! It is sturdy but the process of putting it together is a PAIN IN THE BUTT!
customer_reviews.author: LanWang

customer_reviews.title: Good Frame for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 of these beds for my kids and they were relatively easy to assemble. I love that it's metal, and a platform bed so I didn't need boxsprings. My only complaint is the headboard is a little shorter than I thought it would be. The frame itself is quite sturdy, even with rowdy kids all over them.
customer_reviews.author: PS20

customer_reviews.title: don't get these beds...
customer_reviews.text: I loved them when I first got them...but I does take forever to put together... And within a couple of months the legs has broken off and using things to prop the bed up where the legs was...as a buyer I would shy away from this product unless u want to replace it soon...I ordered 2 full size and one twin...all of them alike... Falling apart...:-(
customer_reviews.author: jennifer poff

customer_reviews.title: Full size frame
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda nervous about this frame. I can hold up to 400 lbs no problem. Real easy to put together. Wish it was higher. I might buy another mattress just for height
customer_reviews.author: FB Illa

customer_reviews.title: Good bed frame, bad assembly
customer_reviews.text: Some of the pieces were not labeled (some of the slats are slightly different) which caused some guess work then extra time taking it apart and putting it back together because we guessed wrong. Also, some of the threaded holes were covered by the paint which made it very difficult to get the screws in. With two people and an impact gun we had it set up in probably 1-1.5 hours. It seems sturdy and looks just like the picture. The mattress does slide around from side to side a bit because there’s nothing keeping it in place. But the bed frame is fine, just the assembly wasn’t great.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I felt sorry for the UPS driver because he had to deliver this to me to the second floor of my apartment building. The boxes were VERY heavy!!! I'm still working on assembling the bed, so far it's coming along fine....I'm just slow at putting furniture together.
customer_reviews.author: rjf

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO BUILD
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build, looks good and they love it. We are going to buy the Queen and King sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Den in Wildwood

customer_reviews.title: Only purchase for your adolescents
customer_reviews.text: All in all I will not be purchasing anymore furniture from this company or any other company. The bed did come with all the parts and it only took me about an hour to put together. This bed might be good for small children but for a teenager, most definitely NOT!! The bed sits low to the ground and some of the parts didn't even fit, had to rig the parts that didn't for just so the mattress and box spring wouldn't cave in. Wouldn't suggest this bed for anyone over the age of 10. Don't let the picture fool you as far as height goes.
customer_reviews.author: LaTosha Triggs

customer_reviews.title: Great frame!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for our guest bedroom. I assembled it by myself which took about an hour but I imagine with two people it would go much more quickly. The pieces are labeled which makes it easier to follow the directions. I had one extra of one size screw and one less of another so while that was kinda frustrating, they were close enough in size that I used the extra in place of the missing screw and it doesn't seem to have caused any problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, long assembly process.
customer_reviews.text: Great bed, attractive frame, but so difficult to put together. It took three of us about two hours to put together, and not all of the screws fit in properly. Much of the parts that had to be put together by the consumer should have been preassembled to make this process simpler. It didn’t help that many of the pieces weren’t labeled either, making it a guessing game. “Easy assembly” is a lie. All in all, still worth the effort though. I didn’t even need my boxspring. I would definitely recommend a thicker mattress with this purchase however, as the frame is pretty low to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: Good but need modifications if your going to use with Boxspring
customer_reviews.text: First - You're going to need to assemble in the bedroom where it going to live, especially if your bedroom is down a hallway; trust me on this. If you're going to use with a Box Spring, you're might want to use a few strips of velcrow or something similar on to top of the frame, otherwise, it will easily slide from side to side with very little pushing.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Nicole Crandall

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for the price
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was quick with a very handy husband. I don’t think I would have been strong enough to line up and secure some parts on my own. There is a memory foam mattress on it, and it slid around like crazy, so I bought a non slip pad to put underneath...problem solved! My five year old is using it. No creaks, doesn’t slide too much on wood floors...overall good bed!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble–no squeaks or wobbles
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this myself in under an hour. I had absolutely no issues whatsoever during assembly and it's extremely sturdy with no squeaking at all! My boyfriend and I both sleep on it, totaling together about 350 pounds. The only thing I'd recommend is taping a rug mat to the frame before your mattress to keep it from sliding off. The metal is pretty slippery but a couple of rug mats fixes that perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather W.

customer_reviews.title: Spend $30 more and get a good bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Legs are broken after only 2 months! A skinny girl was using it for 2 months and the legs are bend. Do not buy if you weigh over 100 pounds! Also, it’s really noisy. Every single movement makes a noise. Spend $30 more and get a good bed frame. It’s also impossible to take it apart!
customer_reviews.author: dz

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: So somehow my 40 lb five year old has managed to bend several of the bars under the mattress. Weight limit on this bed is a lot higher then this so I’m dumbfounded at this. I’m not happy at this turn out. We did not use box spring to keep her lower to the floor. Overall we liked the design just wish the support bars held up longer as we will no be replacing this bed sooner than planned (owned less than 6 month).
customer_reviews.author: redtaz

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Can Be Difficult... Taking It Apart May Be Worse
customer_reviews.text: This is a trying task to put together if you mess it up. So read the instructions very carefully and pay attention to each piece. The main flaw I see is that it was difficult to get the bars in that go under the mattress. They are in so tight now that I don't think I'll be able to get them out without bending the metal. Luckily, it's a light frame, so I might be able to transport it whole. I don't know if anyone else sees this as an issue or just me...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Has made a perfect, simple bed frame for my son and the full sized memory foam mattress I bought for him. Very easy to follow directions and looks exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: James Call

customer_reviews.title: best buy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Sturdy bed frame for my daughter, I saw this online for good price though I give it a try. It was easy to put together and so far is sturdy and my daughter love it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria G.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this frame
customer_reviews.text: If you ever have to take this bed apart don't buy this frame! We had to take it a part due to a move and it won't come apart! The slats do not come out easily at all and there are no instructions for taking it a part. We now have a couple of broken slats simply from trying to pull them out. This was a waste of my money for sure! They went together great and were sturdy and comfortable but if you have to move they have to come a part and this frame does not do that without damage. Waste of money spend more on a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bed frames! Great cost as well!!
customer_reviews.text: My goodness THANK YOU. The instructions were very easy to follow! I did need to use a hammer to pound some slats in on the final step but that's ok. GREAT BED FRAMES! I bought two for my two grandsons. Thank you for these. They are sturdy and very nice- looking. Also thanks to Amazon for selling these! I bought the Linenspa mattresses to go with them. THOSE ARE GREAT, TOO!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly problems
customer_reviews.text: The beds look ok when you get them together. The instructions don’t have words like it’s an ikea product. The reason this product gets 3 stars from me is because SEVERAL of the pieces for the slate of the bed cane bent. That made them impossible to use because the wouldn’t go into their designated spot. There was no damage to the box. Also because 1 screw and 1 bolt were missing making the bed not as sturdy as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Cee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and simple
customer_reviews.text: It was so simple my 12 year old son put it together by himself. It's made of durable metal and as long as you torqueall of the nuts and bolts down it is a very sturdy bed
customer_reviews.author: DaMack

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bed especially for the price. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed, easy to read instructions. My husband weighs over 200 and was laying on this with our 2 year old plus I was sitting on it all at the same time with no problems. I will buy again. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Donahoe

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, seems sturdy, good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to update my review. In about a week the screws came loose. We fixed that. I suggest adding lock-tight liquid for the screws. The bed frame now seems unstable. The legs are not all level. I am not sure how this happened because when put this together it was very stable. I will try and update this review. The bed frame looks good and is sturdy. It was assembled in an hour with 2 people. In my opinion, it is worth the money. I believe it will hold up over time. I bought it for my daughter to use in her college apartment.
customer_reviews.author: James Kulo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Pretty. After Some Hard Work Though
customer_reviews.text: The bed looks amazing and sturdy. Its very pretty. However, when assembling we realized the last step was putting in the bars, so you could place the bed on top. Youd think it would be really easy, but actually most of the pieces didnt click into place on their own. We hammered the pieces to fit in their slots, shaping the metal into a good 90° angle. Making it easier to insert. After we figured that out it was pretty easy to just click everything into place. I have no idea what we're going to do if we move though. Its very hard to take apart again.
customer_reviews.author: Suri S Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: So, for the money, you really can’t beat it. My sons twin mattress does seem to be a BIT too big for the frame (maybe an inch). I wish there was something securing the mattress a bit. My one super complaint is this: why no screws so that a drill could be used? Allen keys are the worst for this type of product. Took about an hours to assemble with another person helping me. But, really, it looks great and serves its purpose well. This isn’t cheap metal, and unlike particle board it isn’t going to break if a child jumps on it or something.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Uzzo

customer_reviews.title: Study and easy to make!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my boys room and they were simple to build and sturdy! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price and a nice looking bed.
customer_reviews.author: Stay sail

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: pretty easy to put together. Looks ok. Cons: claims to support up to 260(more or less). My son who weighs maybe 100 pounds And has only had this bed about 2 months now has bent bars. I suggest not buying unless you’re only planning on using it for a month. Even then you may end up with a squeaky bed with bent bars.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed frame for my 11 year old daughter. Only took me about an hour to put together by myself. Didn't need any extra tools. I was very satisfied to see how sturdy it was after it was all done. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great frame
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great bed frame and has held up for about 4 months now. I was a bit skeptical at first but it appears to be holding in. I will say though that at times the frame feels wobbly or as if one of the legs is a bit short. I made sure to assemble it as described.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made. Poor quality metal
customer_reviews.text: My 80 lb 10yr old slept on this bed for 1 year. No horseplay / jumping ..... slats are bent where he lays. You can see the shape of his body indented into the slats. Looks really nice and seems sturdy after assembly. Needs a little more backbone though. I would have hit the ground if it would have been my bed. Def not for a grown man
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and works as stated.. Reccomend getting small flat base for mattress box spring but can use without
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok with just the mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to continue to use my box springs and several people in the Q&A said they were able to use this with their box springs but I tried it and it makes the bed way too tall. Seems ok with just the mattress so far but the mattress slides on the slick metal rails. Very study and well made. Easy assembly, just follow the enclosed instructions. The style is nice.
customer_reviews.author: That Ain't Working

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: The bed looks like it does in the picture it holds good I'm 200 +and if it can hold me okay it can hold almost anyone you have to make sure you tighten all your bolts and it's
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Nice
customer_reviews.text: This was affordable. But looks nice and, is very sturdy. It was easy to assemble as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melkel

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: My husband and daughter took forty five minutes to put it togather with minimum glitch You have to follow the instructions to the latter and you'll have no problen. It was a little bit bigger than the matrass I had so I guess buying the complete set with the recommended matrass would eliminate that ,delivery was quick as well
customer_reviews.author: mariesh

customer_reviews.title: Not so strong
customer_reviews.text: I want a metal frame for my sons room I like this one from the pictures and bought it but the bottom legs that are supposed to level the bed in the middle are not stable at all I had to return it they wouldn’t stay up and it don’t come with extra pieces to secure it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina P.

customer_reviews.title: ... together by himself and he said it was very easy!! He used every piece it came with ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend put this together by himself and he said it was very easy!! He used every piece it came with and it is very sturdy with the two of us on it! Our 12" mattress makes us pretty high off the ground, but we really wanted space under the bed so that's not an issue for us even though I'm only 5'4". Overall for the price this is 100% worth it. Not sure on the longevity of the piece, but honestly at this price point it's not like I'm expecting to keep this thing for more than a few years, if even that long.
customer_reviews.author: Alison M.

customer_reviews.title: Affordale and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Easy set up. I set it up by myself (though it is a two person job). I took me about an hour and a half for the whole set up. Its so simple my 4 year old could probably do it. I only gave it 4 stars because the mattress does slide everywhere but I'm sure I could find something to help it stick.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Savage

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I received the bedframe ... the box was really heavy for a 69 year old women; however the delivery lady and I managed (lol). I started assembling it on my front porch because I figured it would be easier than doing it in the bedroom. Yep, I was right. It was easier to do it by sections and then transport it to the room. Great frame and super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Black

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: When ordering a bed frame online for $90 and having it delivered in 2 days you can't expect much. However, this bed holds up nicely. Assembling was interesting because I was sent the wrong building plans and it was missing 2 screws, but it was simple enough. 5 months later and the bed is mostly sturdy, it squeaks pretty loudly and shifts when you move around on it. It holds the mattress well and it's the best quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Late arrival. Terrible packaging. Chipped/Broken Pieces. Mediocre instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Package came later than expected. The 44lb package was secured with only clear tape along the edges. The legs of the base were broken because the plastic caps on the bottom of the legs were chipped and falling apart. The instructions (a simple stapled packet of 2 sheets of paper) were clear enough for me, but I'm an engineering student. For the average person, it would have been just as, if not more, confusing than a typical IKEA bed frame. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: CollegeLyfe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old loves it!! Wasn't hard to put together. Very sturdy. And dosent move around on her when she's in it.. no slipping and sliding in this bed (LOL) highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: nichole bernardo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble no tools needed
customer_reviews.text: This product was so easy to assemble and lightweight. I love it looks great not gaudy. Definitely worth the $$ spent .
customer_reviews.author: Justicelover

customer_reviews.title: Great for the guest room
customer_reviews.text: The directions could use some improvement but the pictures helped. Assembly didn’t take too long and I did it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya S

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all!
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for your buck here. Feels sturdy even with me and my 2 daughters on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob A.

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble because we follow the manual intructions. It came well packing.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for 4 months!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok..so you get what you pay for, I understand that but when you purchase the bed for your 3 year old who weighs 30lbs. The mattress support bars should not bend. Bed should only be bought for decoration purposes only
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Sooo Close but no cigar.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bed frame for my 11 year old, he enjoys it also. however it was shipped with 3 7a pieces and only 1 7b piece... i had to improvise to get it together. Less of a hassle than trying to apply for a refund an then ship back such a heavy package, pay restock, meh. No, just a mess not worth it to me... Shame tho. Would have been a solid 5star purchase otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: .:*Tpizzle*:.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried and tried to get a good supportive bed. I bought the firmest mattress that I could, yet I was never satisfied with the support. When I put my mattress on this bed, wow! The firm support is wonderful. I highly recommend this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I brought 3 beds 2 of the 3 beds came with missing screws and a damaged boxes, that were half open.. terrible product the one bed that I was able to install was not strudy, it shakes every time I sit down..
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: Great frame
customer_reviews.text: Bought this frame for my daughter. It fits product description and was easy to assembly. It is a beautiful frame.
customer_reviews.author: Charly

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive bed frame that goes together pretty easily. It is good for young people who probably won't stay anyplace for very long. My son bought this for his first apartment. I helped him put it together. It requires minimal tools. An allen wrench came in the box. It is also handy to have some screwdrivers and a hammer. Some of the pieces snap into place and some force is necessary. One of the screws didn't line up quite right and may have stripped, but we were able to get enough pieces together that it is OK. It is good furniture for someone on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: HMO

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, sturdy, and perfect for our guest room!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something sturdy and cute for our guest room and I was so happy to come across this bed frame! It looks so good and is perfect for the space. I love the height and this frame is much more stylish than other similarly priced frames that don’t have headboards.
customer_reviews.author: Sbrown906

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Worth it for the money Assembly needs two people and is supplied with one wrench and that made it difficult and more time consuming and the fact that no word instructions but pictorial only. Overall I think it’s great product
customer_reviews.author: NOEMI B. FRANCIA

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED...Accurate instructions and SOLID parts across the board!
customer_reviews.text: We are VERY PLEASED with the overall construction of this bed frame. The instructions and assembly were accurate and precise. We were a little skeptical to purchase a 'pre-fab' style bed frame just in general, but once assembled...this GreenForest bed frame is exactly what we needed!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyfrx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Frame is good... Mattresses slide off... It does need the options to put on side clips or small rails to keep the mattress in place.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Skiles

customer_reviews.title: Bed frame
customer_reviews.text: It's simple. Not bulky. They included a video to help put it together on youtube. Only problem i have with the twin frame, our mattress slides on the metal rails. I have a bed rail for my 4 year old so he doesn't fall off, so the mattress dosent slide. They did mention to re-tighten thr bolts after 6 months. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Candycane622

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky Sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought this long time back. Didn't start using it until recently. The frame makes a squeaky noise. It's so irritating. Tried to tighten up all the screws, but that didn't help at all. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tushar

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a twin for my son and it’s pretty nice. Very simple, doesn’t take up too much room, assemble time was about one hour with just one person working on it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed for my full grown 200lb+ son. Using with memory foam mattress. Great bed for the money
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Green

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about 6 months. No squeaks or slipping of mattress, and i have not needed to tighten it since initial assembly. Assembled it myself with no difficulty. I sleep alone on my full size and it feels very solid. Definitely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Set up is time consuming but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this bed for my daughter. She absolutely loves it. Set up was a bit daunting but, if you set the pieces up in numerical order and separate the screws for when you need them, it becomes easier. We had a couple of hiccups while putting the bed together but overall it was easy. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to Assemble. NO 🚫🚫🚫
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to assemble. Really didn't give much in the way of directions and a lot of small parts that are not labeled. Tried and could not make heads or tails of it and cannot return because I'm pretty sure we ruined it trying to fit together wrong parts.
customer_reviews.author: mizzmerrz

customer_reviews.title: Good frame for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great bed frame for the price. I've got a 6" memory foam mattress on my son's bed and it's even comfortable for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Good lightweight bed tools needed included
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but had to use my brain the wrong instructions sent. If you email them they will send you the right ones. Takes about an hour to put together. Looks like picture. After a month seems to be the support needed to not need a box spring.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney M

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the money. Solid and stable.
customer_reviews.text: Product itself seems solid and sturdy. Looks very nice. Assembly instructions were not good. Company reached out to me after I reviewed and complained about the instructions. They have updated the instructions and the customer service is very Solid. My 9 year old LOVES his new bed.
customer_reviews.author: Joel C Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Green Forest Twin Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely though this was a cute reliable bed frame for my teen. They only last 8 months and the frame legs bent.
customer_reviews.author: donna Tursi Massey

customer_reviews.title: Great frame for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. It's very sturdy, came with all the pieces, easy to assemble and my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great simple frame for my son's room.
customer_reviews.text: My son decided he was too old for his bunk bed and wanted a simple bed for his room, this was very easy to put together-with his minimal assistance it took less than an hour. I love that it doesn't require a boxspring. So far it's holding up really well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I like this bed frame a lot for my daugther, but one thing about this it's a lot of work setting up this bed frame it took me almost two hours. I recommend for you to read the instructions 2 or 3 times before doing anything. I sort of mess up and cant undone. I like it but I dont love it it's a lot of work. Works well!
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for toddler new to sleeping in a bigger bed. Not too high off ground. Nice deign. Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Jojo1971

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: I really needed this because the mattress and topper Amazon sent me are 17" high and I didn't want my pillows falling on the floor and it was my favorite color
customer_reviews.author: mudpretzel

customer_reviews.title: Good frame, It arrived with a couple of dents ...
customer_reviews.text: Good frame, It arrived with a couple of dents in the headboard and footboard tubes but nothing I cant live with. It also did not have the first page of the instructions that show how to put the headboard and footboard together but I figured it out. I'm deducting one star because of these 2 issues.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good just to much noise when I love around haha! But over all easy to put together and good
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

product_meta.title: GreenForest Twin Bed Frame Platform with Headboard and Stable Metal Slats Mattress Base Boxspring Replacement, Black
feature_bullets: Twin bed frame size:77.55‘’* 36.02‘’*34.84‘’，the hot spots of this metal bed frame are its simple design and classical lines .Pls ignore the "Single" which printing on package
Strong bedstead and manufacturing experience can avoid noise, vibration and scratches. It's accords with ergonomic design, and provide you with a comfortable sleep.
The bed frame is made of steel with ultimate strength and safety design, where its 6 legs contact the floor for durability and stability. Simply with a mattress, you will enjoy a sweet sleep!

Bed frame size:77.55‘’* 36.02‘’*34.84‘’ ,there is 12 inches of storage space under the bed, which provides ample storage space. It is easy to move, access, and can place storage boxes, quilts, clothes, toys and so on.
Please follow the instructions to install step by step. All parts with clearly label,easy to assemble with very clear instructions
